column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: The outer loop is shut down at Georgetown Rd due to a serious collision between Old Frankfort Pike and Versailles Rd.  A motorcyclist is reportedly involved.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: No traffic allowed from Leestown Rd to the outer loop of New Circle Rd.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:

column4: Outbound Richmond Rd at Woodspoint Rd
column5: At least one lane is blocked.
